channel.title: Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20 - help please
channel.description:
I started a new thread with a more informative title.
Every time I try to tun the client, it opens the Moparscape and a message appears on the game screen that says: Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading Runescape. To fix this try the following(in order) 1.Close all browser windows and reloading - check, still not working 2.Try clearing cache - done, still not working 3.Try using different game world - I don't know if this even applies... 4.Try rebooting your computer - done, still broken 5.Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu - I don't think this applies either...
Also, this - "Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20" - appears in the text console under the game screen -any ideas what that means?
I have JDK 6 u.7 and JRE 6 u.7 which is the most updated I could find. If you can, please help me. If you need any info about my computer or anything specific feel free to ask. But please don't post unless you want to help. Thanks.

item.title: Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20 - help please
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

That’s why everyone says ‘Backup your work’ because error’s are caused by the slightest thing and you’d never be able to fix it if you forget what you’ve done. If you haven’t made any changes to this, then it sounds like an issue with the Java. I’d make sure that all ‘Java’ related programs are closed before hand, just to ensure that Java is going to be used.

Read full topic
item.source: Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20 - help please

item.title: Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20 - help please

item.description:
@genuisdog wrote:

I started a new thread with a more informative title.

Every time I try to tun the client, it opens the Moparscape and a message appears on the game screen that says:
Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading Runescape.
To fix this try the following(in order)
1.Close all browser windows and reloading - check, still not working
2.Try clearing cache - done, still not working
3.Try using different game world - I don’t know if this even applies…
4.Try rebooting your computer - done, still broken
5.Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu - I don’t think this applies either…

Also, this - “Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20” - appears in the text console under the game screen -any ideas what that means?

I have JDK 6 u.7 and JRE 6 u.7 which is the most updated I could find. If you can, please help me. If you need any info about my computer or anything specific feel free to ask. But please don’t post unless you want to help. Thanks.
